data.title: Usher Girlfriend, Who's He Dating Now? Who Were His Ex
data.meta_description: Usher's girlfriend and who he's dating now, including who are his ex wives? The Super Bowl halftime performer will take to the stage at the NFL championships.
data.text:
Jenn Goicoechea (2019 to present)

Usher and his girlfriend Jenn Goicoechea made their public debut in 2019. Jenn is a music industry heavyweight in her own right, as the senior vice president of A&R at Epic Records and in both 2020 and 2021, she was named one of Billboardâ€™s R&B/Hip-Hop Power Players.

Weâ€™re not exactly sure how sure they met but it was likely at an industry event. The couple went social media official when she posted a photo of her whispering in Usherâ€™s ear. â€œNot sure what Iâ€™m saying or who Iâ€™m speaking too ğŸ™„ğŸ˜‚ But my nails look good ğŸ’…ğŸ¼ğŸ˜œ,â€ she wrote in the caption.

The happy couple have two children together; a daughter named Sovereign Bo, in 2020, as well as a son named Sire Castrello, whom they welcomed in 2021. During an appearance on Good Morning America in 2020, Usher gushed about their family. â€œBabies always bring such joy to a family and [Iâ€™m] really excited for my young oneâ€”well, my beanâ€™s arrival,â€ he said.

Speaking with People, Usher descibed the love he has for his partner, Jenn. â€œI have an amazing partner, a support system,â€ he explained. â€œWe have an amazing dynamic between our relationship where Iâ€™m able to be passionate still about what I do and have an incredible partner to work through some of the harder times as a young man dealing with children and dealing with the dynamic of how you communicate with them.â€

He continued: â€œSheâ€™s better at it than me in many lights. Iâ€™m a man-man, so Iâ€™m like, â€˜This is what weâ€™re doing,â€™ and I might be a little bit more disciplinary at times.â€ Metaphorically, â€œIf thereâ€™s a slap and a hug, Iâ€™m the slap and sheâ€™s the hug. But that creates balance.â€ He concluded: â€œIâ€™m very happy, very fortunate to have an incredible friend, not just a partner,â€ he says. â€œSheâ€™s my best friend and I love her.â€

They got a marriage license ahead of his performance at the Super Bowl on February 11, 2024, according to E! news.

â€œListen, when you find someone that you know is a great partner, of course it is an honor and a pleasure to be able to share life with someone who wants to share it with you and loves you, who you are,â€ the singer told People earlier this week, later adding, â€œWeâ€™ve obviously made a commitment to life for life together because of our children. It wouldnâ€™t be odd for us to get married. We already did here. You know what Iâ€™m saying?â€

â€œAnd weâ€™re going to be in each otherâ€™s lives until we die, obviously, because we have something to share,â€ he added. â€œThatâ€™s beautiful. Our children. But not because of that. I really do feel like I have an amazing partner that I respect.â€
